title: The shepheards pipe
author: Browne, William, 1590-ca. 1645.
publisher: Printed by N[icholas] O[kes] for George Norton, and are to be sold at his shop without Temple-barre,
notes: "Other eglogues: by Mr. Brooke, Mr. Wither, and Mr. Davies" and "An other eclogue by Mr. George Wither" each have separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Cropped at head; A2,3 transposed; A4 replaces blank G8.
